step.cmd: To create a custom field, go to settings-> issues -> Fields category - > custom field

step.note: Here the field type used as a text box (Single line). You can customerize the field according to the requirment.
step.cmd: From the top right corner, click on create custom field. You can choose field type according to the text input.
To configure the custom field fill the details in text field with the name and description, then click on create button.
Ensure that the new custom field has been created.
To enable the custom field and your project, you need to select project screen share to see in the created project. You can find screen option in the setting icon, which is next to new custom field.
Select the checkbox to enable the screen, which field you want to displayed and to update.
Copy the webpage URL to access the custom field.
